data.what_is:
Our platform offers you all the tools that you can use for your outbound marketing in order to grow your company, find leads, send emails, create a chatbot and more. All tools are oriented to drive new leads and customers to your company to make it grow.

We offer unlimited access to all the software we have without no limit, do not pay any more per lead!

How Does it Work?
- Domain Email Search
- Export - Email, Phone & Social Media From A List Of Websites
-Single/ Bulk Email Finder
- Chatbot Solution
- Online Review Management 
-New Registered Domains With Contact Information
- Email Drip Campaigns
-API To Prevent Fake Emails Registration On Your Service
-Social Proof Notification Widget To Increase Credibility On Your Website
-Extract B2B Emails From B2B Social Media And Build Targeted Lists
data.product_description:
Our platform offers you all the tools that you can use for your outbound marketing in order to grow your company, find leads, send emails, create a chatbot and more. All tools are oriented to drive new leads and customers to your company to make it grow.

We offer unlimited access to all the software we have without no limit, do not pay any more per lead!

How Does it Work?
- Domain Email Search
- Export - Email, Phone & Social Media From A List Of Websites
-Single/ Bulk Email Finder
- Chatbot Solution
- Online Review Management 
-New Registered Domains With Contact Information
- Email Drip Campaigns
-API To Prevent Fake Emails Registration On Your Service
-Social Proof Notification Widget To Increase Credibility On Your Website
-Extract B2B Emails From B2B Social Media And Build Targeted Lists

initial_reviews.review_title: Marketing Tools Growth Marketing Platform  Review
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Tools Growth Marketing Platform?
I got to know so many ways to expand my digital marketing strategies. There are many different-2 tools available with Growth Marketing Platform which are quite easy to use!

What do you dislike about Marketing Tools Growth Marketing Platform?
Nothing as of now but will definitely share update in case I find any :)

Recommendations to others considering Marketing Tools Growth Marketing Platform:
Most of the tools are quite easy to use. In addition to that, you'll get to know a couple of new things which will definitely help in growing your business.

What problems is Marketing Tools Growth Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Fulfilling digital market needs and helping clients and vendors to grow their business and market reachability.

initial_reviews.review_title: It's a must have if you want to market a product or a service!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Tools Growth Marketing Platform?
The marketers can easily do contact management, build segments, import contacts through API, create marketing campaigns, build workflow/journeys and execute the campaigns.

What do you dislike about Marketing Tools Growth Marketing Platform?
There's nothing specific to dislike but I thik UI should be optimised to upload large chunks of data seamlessly.

What problems is Marketing Tools Growth Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer engagement, re-marketing, performance marketing, building sales funnel and improving conversion rates and spread awareness about the product or services.
